dict.acceptation: 战争，战役；比赛，较量；长期论战或长期作战；激烈的竞争；

sent.orig: Battle after battle took place in which the enemy suffered heavy losses.
sent.trans: 战斗一个接一个地进行，在这些战斗中敌人蒙受了重大损失。

sent.orig: DirectX7 achieved using a tank battle game in support of the two Battle.
sent.trans: 一个利用DirectX7实现的坦克战的游戏，支持两人对战。

sent.orig: This battle is over Leonidas. -This battle is over when I say it is over.
sent.trans: 这场战争结束了-要等到我说结束才结束！

sent.orig: Analyzes the process of warship battle damage assessment, gains basic process of warship battle damage assessment.
sent.trans: 分析了舰船战场损伤评估过程，从而得到舰船战场损伤评估的基本流程。

sent.orig: The troops were being prepared for battle/to go into battle.
sent.trans: 部队已作好战斗准备[已准备好投入战斗]。
